fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Eavesdrop** (Unlimited uses): Choose a player each night to eavesdrop on their conversations. You will be able to see all whispers, chat logs, and private messages they send and receive, including those from other players. You cannot alter or delete any messages. This ability bypasses any immunity to role-blocking or detection.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, **Thought Thief**: You can choose one player each night to target. If your target uses an ability that night, you will also gain a copy of their ability and be able to use it the following night. This ability cannot copy unique roles or abilities that can only be used once.
- During Tuesday and Friday, **Mental Manipulation**: If you are investigated or inspected, the results will always return as "Your target seems innocent" or "Your target is not suspicious." This effect applies to all investigative roles, including Sheriffs, Investigators, Consigliere, and more.
